tool_description: Shows the all the best information about fortnite!
name: Fortnite
title: Fortnite

api_list.name: Items (All)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fortnite4.p.rapidapi.com/items/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fortnite4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
